transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Obsidian Gladiator's Silk Hood

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 947,725 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 526,592.
Set: Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify apply Insurance! for 10 sec to one target while Apotheosis is active. Your healing is increased by 1% for each Insurance! active on allies.

spells.description: Use: Removes all movement impairing effects and all effects which cause loss of control of your character. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
